sources.title: Mr. Perrin and Mr. Traill
sources.description: Title: Mr. Perrin and Mr. Traill Summary: An elderly British schoolmaster is upset when a new teacher comes to the school and is an immediate success with the boys. The older man thinks he isn't getting the respect he deserves. Directed by: Lawrence Huntington Actors: Marius Goring, David Farrar, Greta Gynt Production Company: Two Cities Films Release Date: 27 September 1948 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An elderly British schoolmaster is upset when a new teacher comes to the school and is an immediate success with the boys. The older man thinks he isn't getting the respect he deserves.

metadata.Plot: An elderly British schoolmaster is upset when a new teacher comes to the school and is an immediate success with the boys. The older man thinks he isn't getting the respect he deserves.
metadata.Writer: Hugh Walpole, L.A.G. Strong, T.J. Morrison
